page.shortlink: api client api a5 panelcard refresh method

argument.name: sizeAll
argument.description: Whether or not to size all child panel's regardless of possible lack of nested size changes. The default value is false.

discussion.p: Refresh the panel size with out recalculating the bound sizing. This is useful if a panel header or footer changes in height.

page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class pObj.refresh(true); // do a refresh that forces all child panels to be refreshed
